column.h1: Latest stable builds of Maltcms and Maui are now available
column.p: The latest stable builds of Maltcms and Maui are available from our continuous integration system.
column.message: We recommend these distributions only to experienced users or developers.

ul.li: Maltcms stable builds, passing all unit and integration tests are available here.
Maui stable builds, passing all unit and integration tests are available here.
